meanings.definition: The act or practice of installing or repairing faucets.
meanings.sent1: His expertise in faucetry made him the go-to person for any plumbing issues.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of faucetry from her father who was a skilled plumber.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best faucetry skills at the plumbing convention was intense.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in faucetry was like a symphony conductor directing every movement.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of faucetry lies in the seamless flow of water from the tap.

meanings.definition: The trade or profession of working with faucets.
meanings.sent1: After completing his apprenticeship, he officially entered the world of faucetry.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in faucetry and provides top-notch services to its clients.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her love life was like a complicated dance of faucetry professionals.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, faucetry experts were always in high demand.
meanings.sent5: The art of faucetry requires both skillful hands and a keen eye for detail.
